entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
